numbered_ace_sentences: 1. MLB has 40% players of color.
2. MLB has the least amount of players of color.
3. MLB has 20% managers and head coaches of color.
4. MLB has the second least amount of managers and head coaches of color.
5. MLS has 41% head coaches of color.
6. MLS has the highest amount of head coaches of color.
7. The NBA has 83% players of color.
8. The WNBA has 83% players of color.
9. The NBA and the WNBA have the highest amount of players of color.
10. The NFL has more than 70% players of color.
11. The NFL has 13% coaches of color.
12. I wonder why MLB has few coaches of color.
13. In MLB, 2 in 5 players are people of color.
14. In MLB, 1 in 5 coaches are people of color.
15. I wonder why the NFL has 13% coaches of color.
16. In the NFL, 74% of players are people of color.
17. If a person does not see himself in his idols then it is harder for the person to believe that the person can become what the person wants to be.
18. A person of color may want to become an NFL coach.
19. A person of color may never see a person of color be an NFL coach.
20. If a person wants to be an MLB player and the person only sees players who do not look like the person then the person will feel discouraged.
21. If a person feels discouraged then the person might not go after the dream of the person.
22. The headline is: Percentage of People of Color in Professional Sports.
